channel.title: About1 on Prabhat
channel.description: Recent content in About1 on Prabhat

item.title: Aacharya Raghavendra J Prabhat
item.description: Aacharya Raghavendra J Prabhat: Aacharya Raghavendra J Prabhat hails from the culturally rich Lineage of Saint Poet Purandara Dasaru, Father of Carnatic Classical Music. Often termed as an intellectual orator, Aacharya Raghavendra J Prabhat, is a writer, literati, director, philosopher, poet, Costume designer and one of Karnataka’s foremost cultural figures, well versed in diverse fields of music, dance, theatre, and spiritualism.

item.title: Bharat R Prabhath
item.description: Bharat R Prabhath: Bharat R Prabhath hails from the illustrious family of Prabhath. The originative highbrow was exposed to the values of Indian arts, culture and traditions from a very young age.

item.title: Guru Shakuntala R Prabhath
item.description: Guru Shakuntala R Prabhath: Shakuntala R Prabhath is one of Karnataka’s many splendid artists. A classical Bharatanatyam dancer and prime Natuvanar par excellence, Guru. Shakuntala is trained in Bharatanatyam style of dance under the renowned guru Smt.

item.title: Sharat R Prabhath
item.description: Sharat R Prabhath: Sharat has had the fortune of being very closely associated with Indian arts and culture from a very young age. He began his training in Carnatic classical music under the able guidance of Dr Hamsini Nagendra.
